channel.title: Patricia on O linuxu
channel.description: Recent content in Patricia on O linuxu

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 01-07
item.description: This is a modest re-write of chapters 1 - 7. None of the changes are “earth shattering,” but hopefully most of the typos, grammar mistakes, timeline errors, and implausible or unexplained science has been corrected.

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 08 - Perils, Proposals, and Progeny
item.description: Homeland Security, US Navy, International Smuggling, and people who just love mermaids. The mers face new challenges and new mers.

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 09 - Autopsies, Admirals, and Adversaries
item.description: New mers bond with their new pod-mates, the Connors finally make landfall and discover the changes and more, but they cannot stay, at least not all of them. The story continues.

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 10 - Re-adjustments, Reprisals, and Revelations
item.description: Trevor and Rose finish their changes, Pat makes new discoveries about mermaid bodies, new potential mers arrive on Mermaid Island. The saga continues

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 11 - Babies, Beliefs, and By-Products
item.description: New mers, new babies, new challenges, a new transition, and new discoveries that make Mermaid Island a busy place.

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 12 - SEALS, Surprises, and Steadfastness
item.description: Joy recruits an old friend to be a new mer, the Moon Pool itself changes, and the saga continues.

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 13 â€“ MAD-mers, CHEW, and Poly-mers
item.description: The saga continues, Pat and the scientists experiment with mer-bonds, the Connors return to Mermaid Island, Joy and Mac find a mole in Malaki’s organization, the mers learn more about their new bodies and capabilities, and Rose discovers a secret about their mer-organs.

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 14 - Choosing Change
item.description: The epic tail (pun) of Mermaid Island continues. The mer scientists unlock the secret of the microorganisms, Abao attacks, Hank Connor and his crew transition to mers, Joy and Mac face uncertainties, and we learn more about the nature of mer-life.

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 15 - Camouflage, Connections, and Chesapeake
item.description: The story picks up from where we last left off. Mac and Joy are unconscious, near death; the rescue team arrives in Davao searching for the Thompson’s mother; Trevor’s pod delivers the doomsday device and rescues some crash survivors; and another slice of paradise is revealed.

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 16 - Science, Sons, and Sirens
item.description: Mac’s Pod on Taylor’s Island completes, the three “new” pods on Mermaid Island begin their changes, the world comes another step closer to discovering the mers.

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 17 - Waiting, Wondering, Worrying
item.description: Mers and soon-to-be-mers in both oceans wonder if their struggle for peace will be successful. The last of the rescued survivors begin their journeys as the Chesapeake mers make new discoveries and add new members. Will Malaki finally face justice? The saga continues!
